about.title: // about_me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate fullstack developer with over 5 years of experience building modern, scalable web and mobile applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern full-stack frameworks, with expertise spanning from frontend interfaces to backend APIs and databases.

My approach combines technical expertise across the entire stack with a keen eye for design, ensuring that every project I work on is both functional and beautiful. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with the latest technologies in both frontend and backend development.

items.description: My responsibilities span the full development lifecycle, including implementing new features, resolving performance bottlenecks, ensuring a smooth and intuitive UI/UX, integrating user feedback, and maintaining the end-to-end functionality that drives the projects' capabilities.

In my role as a software developer, I engineered a high-performance streaming platform utilizing Vue for a responsive frontend and Express to manage a robust backend architecture. I architected the system to support concurrent broadcasting to YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and custom RTMP endpoints, leveraging Nginx as the core streaming engine and AMQP to handle a scalable, asynchronous notification system. Beyond live distribution, I developed integrated video editing and clipping tools that allowed creators to repurpose content for cross-platform delivery, with all media metadata and user data managed via PostgreSQL.

Fullstack Software Engineer specialized in building secure, high-performance applications and optimizing cloud infrastructure. Experienced in end-to-end development with a strong emphasis on security protocols, AI-driven document processing, and automated deployments via Terraform and GitHub Actions. Adept at bridging the gap between complex backend architecture and intuitive user interfaces, with a background in VPN optimization and rigorous system auditing to ensure enterprise-grade stability.

Designed and implemented user interfaces for a delivery application designed for Venezuelan immigrants and refugees. Utilized Flutter and Dart to create a seamless user experience and integrated Firebase for authentication and database management.

Developed a Hospital Management System during the COVID-19 pandemic. Responsible for designing patient registration and appointment assignation using .NET and C#. Developed user interfaces for the patient portal to enhance system usability using Blazor Pages.

items.school: @ Universidad de las Fuerzas Armadas ESPE
